partnerDetails.about:
Our success is built on strong andcollaborative partnerships with the leading contractors in London enhanced byour desire to deliver technically advanced and innovative systems.

We areone of the only BEMS Contractors to have our own full in-house panelmanufacturing facility; this gives us an enormous advantage in speed ofmanufacturing and flexibility in Design and Factory Testing.

Lloret’sPanel Manufacturing turnaround time is one of the best in the industry. All ofour panels are manufactured at our headquarters in Coulsdon, Surrey allowingease of communication across all departments involved.

LloretMaintenance also offer a wide range of facilities, from single plant room systems tofully integrated Building Energy Management Systems.  Incorporating allenvironmental plant and equipment, lighting control, comprehensive energymetering and billing systems.
